name: Arc Finance
description: Arc Finance is a seamless multi-chain Defi platform that offers a liquidity-as-a-service using liquidity protocol and AUM mechanism. The platform facilitates cross-chain transactions and DeFi portfolio premium mining, achieving an efficient and lucrative way to manage liquidity. Arc Finance aims to provide services for various protocols, motivate users to actively trade, improve capital efficiency, and capture the value of liquidity premium.
